meanings.definition: A rare secondary mineral consisting of copper(I) selenite, Cu2SeO3, found in oxidized copper-selenium deposits.
meanings.english_definition: A rare secondary mineral consisting of copper(I) selenite, Cu2SeO3, found in oxidized copper-selenium deposits.

examples.sentence: The dixenite crystals were a deep blue color.
examples.translation: そのdixeniteの結晶は濃い青色だった。

etymology.value: Named after the type locality, the Dixie Mine, Cochise County, Arizona, USA.
